original_text: The cities of the several clans of the Gershonites were in all thirteen cities with their pasturelands.
korean_text: 게르손 사람이 그 가족대로 받은 성읍은 모두 열세 성읍과 그 목초지들이었더라

sentences.original_text: The cities of the several clans of the Gershonites
were in all thirteen cities with their pasturelands.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 초장을 포함하여 모두 열세 성읍이었습니다.
